SEARCH
Package Accounts

Class Admin

java.lang.Object
Accounts.Employee
Accounts.Admin
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAdminManagement, IStaffManagement, Serializable
public class Admin extends Employee implements IAdminManagement, IStaffManagement
Represents an administrator with specific management privileges. Inherits from Employee and implements interfaces for admin and staff management.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Admin

      public Admin(String name, String staffID, char gender, int age, InMemoryDatabase db)
      Constructs an Admin with specified details and initializes the database.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the admin.
      staffID - The unique ID of the admin.
      gender - The gender of the admin.
      age - The age of the admin.
      db - The database connection for the admin operations.

  • Method Details

    • getBranchName

      public String getBranchName()
      Gets the name of the branch associated with the admin. This implementation always returns an empty string as admins do not have an associated branch.
      Specified by:
      getBranchName in class Employee
      Returns:
      The branch name, which is always an empty string.
